TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
2 hours ago, Bej Kerman said:

Granted. Laythe is now a coin.

Post a wish
I wish that you would post a wish

8 minutes ago, Admiral Fluffy said:

I wish that you would post a wish

a wish

I wish for nothing.

Granted. Your world disentigrates into nothing.

I wish i could spell that ^ word correctly

Granted. You type it into DuckDuckGo and it gives you the correct spelling, you now do this every time you are unsure of the spelling of a word, side effect is you now forget how to spell most words without help.

I wish I could remember the spelling of all words without help.

Granted. You are now a Hogwarts librarian and have to create an index of all spell words from the books.

I wish.

Granted.

I wish.

Granted, because it was my wish, too.

I wish an unique wish.

Granted. You no longer have an I Q . (isn't the English language fun and easy to manipulate?)

I wish I could think of that Unique wish.

Granted you get a unique but deadly virus that stops your speaking because you made a grammar mistake above

i wish for a spacecraft

Granted. You get a Space Raft, because you and I and everybody else, makes grammar mistakes regularly. (Though sometimes they are made for Pun value   )

I wish for Mk3s1.5, Mk3s2 and more adapter parts, or atleast to be able to publish all the ones I have made from adapting other mods.

Edited October 25, 2021 by ColdJ

Granted, you get these adapter parts, but they are extremely heavy and useless on rockets due to said weight and they only attach with the top attaching to the bottom and the bottom attaching to the top

i wish to be the leader of a country

Granted. Others have migrated to cities.

I wish both thermoprinters were working ok.

Granted. But they burst into flames after a few minutes because they worked on the highest standard of "ok."

I wish that climate change was reversed.

Granted. Everywhere but the equator is now covered in Ice.

I wish they would work towards making this a better Earth for all to live on, rather than race to get more real estate to ruin.

Granted. Everyone gets the personal best Earth thanks to Matrix.

I wish I had portable Matrix on the flash card.

Granted. You have a packet of flash cards that can be put together to form a matrix.

I wish I could automate editing of a localisation file.

Granted. The localanguage is also selected without your choice.

I wish Sunday Telegraph got seven times more money to be All-Week, not just Sunday, and discovered more new communication technologies yo stop sticking the telegraph bands on a paper sheet..

Granted. Now we only get Sunday's news 7 days a week and the Telegraph's telegraph is dotting and dashing around.

I wish the monday Telegraph didn't get down to only 5 sheets of paper.

Conditionally granted. You can use it twice by rotating the sheet upside-down and reading the dots and dashes in another order.

I wish, the Morse code had also commas.

Btw
https://www.brownielocks.com/morsecodepalindromes.html#:~:text=In a morse code palindrome,think via dits and dahs!

Granted. Everyone who does Morse Code (actually someone else's cipher, but no one ever cares) falls in to a Coma.

I wish for some haptic gloves to control my computer.

Granted. You bought a pair of boxing gloves to push it every time it fails.

I wish there was one universal video codec.

Granted. But it is in 16k and no screen can display it.

I wish the second wish on page 302.

Granted, but you have a bad frame rate.

I wish for the first wish on page 666.

Granted. Yellow cake and mud cake are yours.

I wish I had good frame rate.
